## IHttpErrorSerializer interface

Interface for serializing HttpError instances into different formats. Provides methods for full error details (logging) and client-safe responses.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IHttpErrorSerializer 
```

</td><td>


</td><td>

(error: [HttpError](./error-handler.httperror.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; { topLevel: { name: string; message: string; code: unknown; logLevel: [LogLevel](./error-handler.loglevel.md)<!-- -->; responseMessage: string; meta: {} \| undefined; stack: string \| undefined; }; causeChain: Array&lt;Record&lt;string, any&gt;&gt;; }


</td><td>

Serializes an HttpError into a detailed object including the full error chain. This method is intended for logging and debugging purposes, as it includes sensitive information like stack traces and full error messages.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[serializeResponse](./error-handler.ihttperrorserializer.serializeresponse.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

(error: [HttpError](./error-handler.httperror.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; [ErrorResponse](./error-handler.errorresponse.md)<!-- -->&lt;unknown&gt;


</td><td>

Serializes an HttpError into a client-safe error response. This method strips sensitive information and returns a standardized format suitable for API responses.


</td></tr>
